website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, this medical bracelet is a good choice for anyone who puts comfort and affordability at the top of the list when it comes to this type of medical alert device.
pros: Comes in the option of numerous medical conditions
Medical-grade silicone is lightweight and waterproof
Soft and comfortable on the wrist
cons: Not adjustable, so the fit won't work for everyone
but for the price you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: Excited, only to be let down in the end...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to replace my metal, catch on everything alert bracelet. After wearing this non stop for about 2 months now, the wording has began to come off. How can this be a product you wear 24/7 if the wording rubs off in two months? Back to the metal one I go.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ross

customer_reviews.title: Fades
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that after about a month of wearing it the words started to fade. I never got it wet. They just slowly rubbed off.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Great for active users
customer_reviews.text: I was torn between a medallion or this as I had previously purchased a metal bracelet for my dad that never got worn, so I found this and he hasn’t taken it off. He gardens and tinkers around the house so it’s a good fit for his pace. It seems to be good quality and the lettering shouldn’t fade or wear soon, but will update the review if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: This was bought for my husband who was not happy about wearing a bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my husband who was not happy about wearing a bracelet. He put it on, with a little pressure from me, and has admitted he doesn’t even feel it there. I now feel better knowing he has a warning on him pertaining to his medical problem, and I know he does too! I feel anyone with a medical problem should wear one. It was inexpensive and totally worth the minimal cost. Highly recommend......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO DENYING
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet was bought to help first responders identify or at least consider the issue when treating.
customer_reviews.author: General299

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Band came as described, but unfortunately was just a size too small for my wrists. Wore the bracelet for a few days, but it became uncomfortable for me to continue to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Evans

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but good medical alert
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about this band, but the price was right and it does its job
customer_reviews.author: Lmacie

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice, I wish I could get it an inch smaller. From reading the reviews it looks like the writing will fade but I am OK with that as my more expensive metal engraved bracelet with smaller print faded too.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey F. Davis III

customer_reviews.title: It was good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was good for the price. However, this is the 2nd time I had to buy them because the print fades after use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would like to find one that says see wallet card
customer_reviews.text: I can wear this band. I would like to find one that says see wallet card.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Lasts and is cheap
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace high end medical band. Very durable and cheap enough to not care about replacing. Color hasn't faded. Band still hasn't dry rotted
customer_reviews.author: Robert Picard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kid with autism. No texture sensitivity issues or noises.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: works as intended
customer_reviews.text: These are useful and comfortable. They seem to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Anne B.

customer_reviews.title: The bracelet is important to me to have medical awareness during an episode of hypoglycemia.
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered a day late but~~ it is exactly what I expected in quality. I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: peter mittelsteadt

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind for a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Peace of mind for a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only get 1 bracelet,beware if false advertising!
customer_reviews.text: You only get one bracelet despite the picture false advertising that you get the entire bunch,$7for one bracelet!
customer_reviews.author: Rechelle Webb

feature_bullets: Listed price is for ONE bracelet.
"Medical Alert"+"Your Condition" makes a perfect match.
The printing is resistant to oil and water. Free to wear anywhere anytime.
